pullrequest.title: Fix use of FindZIP without pkg-config

content.raw: That is possible, I only noticed this  because it was called as `find_package(ZIP REQUIRED)` as part of a `-config.cmake` file. Inside ignition  projects, all these scripts are tipically invoked via  `ign_find_package(<pkg>)`, and the `ign_find_package` wrapper never calls `find_package(<pkg>  REQUIRED)`, so the problem is hidden.
